column.Name: StyleSet
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM xCustom9 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: DivisionID
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomID, Custom FROM iCustom1 ORDER BY CustomSort

column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleTypeID, StyleTypeDescription FROM pStyleType ORDER BY StyleTypeOrder

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory Where Active = 1 ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: SizeClass
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM pSizeClass Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: SizeRange
column.lookupquery: SELECT SizeRangeCode, SizeRangeCode AS SizeRangeCodeName FROM pSizeRange Where Active = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: IntroSeasonYearID
column.lookupquery: SELECT SeasonYearID, SeasonYear FROM vwx_SeasonYear_SEL WHERE Active = 1

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom5 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Designer' order by firstname

column.Name: TechnicalDesigner
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Tech Designer' order by firstname

column.Name: StyleThemeID
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleThemeID, ThemeName, sort FROM (SELECT '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as StyleThemeID,'' as ThemeName,NULL as sort UNION SELECT StyleThemeID, ThemeName,sort FROM pStyleTheme WHERE Active=1) t WHERE 1=1 order by sort

column.Name: ProductionManager
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Sourcing' order by firstname
